org.robolectric.res

Class XmlFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.res.XmlLoader
      • org.robolectric.res.XmlFileLoader

  • public class XmlFileLoader
extends XmlLoader
    Loader for xml property files.

    Given a resource file a concrete implementation of XmlResourceParser is returned. The returned implementation is based on the current Android implementation. Please see the android source code for further details.

    Author:
    msama (michele@swiftkey.net)
    See Also:
    https://github.com/android/platform_frameworks_base/blob/master/core/java/android/content/res/XmlBlock.java, Resources.getXml(int)
